name: loseit-data-export
description: Script to export data from LoseIt.com using browser authentication

scripts.setup: npm run db:start && sleep 5 && npm run data:process && npm run db:load && npm run mcp:bundle
scripts.data:update: npm run data:export && npm run data:process && npm run db:load
scripts.db:psql: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U loseit -d loseit
scripts.db:ui: docker-compose --profile ui up -d pgadmin && echo 'pgAdmin available at http://localhost:5050 (admin@loseit.local / admin)'
scripts.mcp:bundle: npm run build && mcpb pack . loseit.mcpb
